ing: 1 (8 ounce) can sweetened cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez)
1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "A great recipe for showers or parties and can be made ahead of time!"
ins: In a large plastic container, combine ice cream, crushed pineapple, coconut cream, pineapple juice and rum. Mix well and slowly stir in the lemon-lime soda. Freeze for 4 hours or until slushy.
